definition: to request leave of absence
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
variant of 假[jia3]/to borrow
fake/false/artificial/to borrow/if/suppose
vacation
see 假掰[gei1 bai1]
leave of absence request (from work or school)

sentences.english: If I overslept because I am ill, I always call in absent to work –
sentences.chinese: 如果我睡过头是因为我生病了，我总会打电话请假。

sentences.english: I have some problems at home these days could you please ask Mr. Wang for permission to leave?
sentences.chinese: 我这几天家里有事，你能帮我向王老师请假吗？

sentences.english: Zargany has taken a leave of absence amid a dispute with the region's provincial council.
sentences.chinese: 萨尔曼省长在当地的一次省级议会上请假缺席。

sentences.english: They take a day of sick leave rather than admit to being off because of pet bereavement.
sentences.chinese: 他们宁可请病假而不愿承认因为痛失宠物而请假。

sentences.english: Can we ask for leave to see our roommate in the hospital?
sentences.chinese: 我们能请假去医院看望我们同寝室的同学吗？

sentences.english: Have you approached the section chief for taking the day off?
The company awarded the employees prizes for full attendance in one month.
sentences.chinese: 这个公司颁发全勤奖给一个月都没请假的员工。

sentences.english: Xiao Feng asked for leave the day before yesterday, Coach Liu called at his home yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 小冯前天请假了，昨天刘教练到他家看过他。

sentences.english: That is why she had a day-off yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 那就是昨天她请假的原因。

sentences.english: Thanks and help summer sun yat sen villa in the magazine asks for leave, MoLing day didn t call her.
sentences.chinese: 谢创帮夏晚晴在杂志社请假，莫凌天没打电话给她。

sentences.english: Secondly, cannot absent, if ill write school.
sentences.chinese: 其次，不能缺席，若生病写请假条。

sentences.english: If you need to leave during your service period you should first report to a responsible person.
sentences.chinese: 服务期间，因故离院需向负责老师请假登记。

sentences.english: To support my application, I submit here a telegram from my brother.
sentences.chinese: 随请假条附上我弟弟拍来的电报，以此证明。

sentences.english: Fill an absence form, and I will sign it.
sentences.chinese: 填一张请假申请单，我给你签字。

sentences.english: Some companies, she added, pay employees’ salaries while they take time off to participate in humanitarian or relief efforts.
sentences.chinese: 有些公司在员工请假参加人道和救济工作时照发工资。

sentences.english: If anybody can not attend the conference, please inform the conference services staff.
sentences.chinese: 因故不能参加，应先请假，并告知会务组。

definition: sick leave
to approve vacation
leave of absence for a personal matter
to take a vacation/to go on holiday
extended leave/prolonged absence
leave of absence request (from work or school)/excuse note/CL:張|张[zhang1]
to have a holiday or vacation
leave of absence request (from work or school)
to go to work/to be on duty/to start work/to go to the office
to report back after a period of absence
to hold a meeting/to attend a meeting
to shift holidays, taking a weekday off
to go on an official or business trip
to be absent from work or school
to resign
to be on sick leave
